item.title: Global VC investments rose 5.4% to $368.5B in 2024, but deals fell 17% | NVCA/Pitchbook
item.description: Global venture capital investments rose to $368.5 billion in 2024, up 5.4% from $349.4 billion a year earlier, the NVCA/Pitchbook said.

item.title: Nvidiaâ€™s AI agent play is here with new models, orchestration blueprints
item.description: Nvidia enters the AI agent space with a family of language models for agentic instruction and orchestrarion frameworks it calls Blueprints.

item.title: Nvidia unveils AI foundation models running on RTX AI PCs
item.description: Nvidia today announced foundation models running locally on Nvidia RTX AI PCs that supercharge digital humans, content creation, productivity and deve...

item.title: Nvidia launches blueprint for AI agents that can analyze video
item.description: Nvidia launched Blueprint for AI Agents that can analyze video today as part of its CES 2025 opening keynote by CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Nvidia gets key design wins to bring AI to autonomous vehicle fleets
item.description: Nvidia has announced it has key design wins for autonomous vehicles with car makers such as Toyota, Aurora and Continental.
